sentences.english: On the other hand, the aesthetic spirit of New Culture Movement made modern Chinese poetry a factualistic art.
sentences.chinese: 新文学运动的美学精神，使新诗成为求实的艺术。

sentences.english: He was closely associated with the literary movement of Symbolism and Decadence.
sentences.chinese: 他是密切相关的文学运动的象征主义与颓废。

sentences.english: Chen Xueshao is an obscure woman write who found herself during the New Cultural Movement.
sentences.chinese: 陈学昭是新文学运动中成长起来却鲜为人知的女作家。

definition: Kaohsiung Incident (aka Formosa Incident), a crackdown on pro-democracy demonstrations in Kaohsiung, Taiwan, on 10 December 1979 during Taiwan's martial law period
social movement/abbr. for 社會運動|社会运动
the Save the Nation Anti-Japanese Protest Movement stemming from the Manchurian railway incident of 18th July 1931 九一八事變|九一八事变

definition: Free China (Cold War era term for the Republic of China on Taiwan, as distinct from "Red China")
civil transport/movement aimed at the masses/democracy movement (abbr.)
anti-imperialist movement of 30th May 1925, involving general strike esp. in Shanghai, Guangzhou, Hong Kong etc
